name: Dioxus Labs
headline: Web, Desktop, and Mobile apps with one codebase in Rust
description: Dioxus makes it easy for developers to quickly build, test, deploy, and manage apps on every platform. We support building and deploying apps for the web, desktop, mobile, AR/VR, and many other exotic targets.

founders.name: Jonathan Kelley, Founder
founders.description: Open source enthusiast with a background in hard engineering and physics.

One codebase,  every platform.
### Dioxus is _the_ Rust framework for building fullstack web, desktop, and mobile apps. Iterate with live hotreloading, add server functions, and deploy in record time.
[Get started](https://dioxuslabs.com/</learn/0.6/#>)[Take a tour](https://dioxuslabs.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=WgAjWPKRVlQ>)
![Animated Icon](https://dioxuslabs.com/assets/multiplatform-dark-c806b7548a262ca1.svg)![Animated Icon](https://dioxuslabs.com/assets/multiplatform-light-abda01e6c8663204.svg)

generated_description:
**Dioxus Labs: Summary**

Dioxus Labs is an innovative technology company founded in 2023 and a participant in the Y Combinator Batch S23. With a compact team of four, based somewhere a bit mysterious (not specified), Dioxus Labs aims to simplify the app development process across multiple platforms using a single codebase in Rust. 

What sets Dioxus apart is its mission: enabling developers to quickly build, test, deploy, and manage applications for web, desktop, mobile, AR/VR, and various other platforms, all from one code source. This approach not only streamlines the development workflow but also allows for features like live hot reloading and server function integration, making it especially appealing for fast-paced development cycles.

The platform is designed for versatility, allowing users to easily create full-stack applications. As they state straightforwardly, "One codebase, every platform." This encapsulates their vision of reducing redundancy and complexity in application development.

For developers looking for resources, Dioxus Labs provides an extensive range of tutorials, guides, and community support channels (like Discord and GitHub). They also feature several projects, showcasing their framework's capabilities, including Dioxus itself, along with tools like CLI and Taffy.

Dioxus is already gaining traction, evident in their collaborations with top-tier companies. Their competitive edge lies in harnessing the growing interest in Rust — a programming language famed for its performance and safety.

If you're a developer eager to tackle modern application challenges with the agility and efficiency that Rust offers, check them out at [Dioxus Labs](https://dioxuslabs.com). Here, building cool things becomes a whole lot easier.
